text: Katheyondu Shuruvagide is a 2018 Indian Kannada-language romantic drama film directed by Senna Hegde and starring Diganth and Pooja Devariya (in her Kannada debut). == Cast == *Diganth as Tarun Manchale *Pooja Devariya as Tanya Mehra *Ashwin Rao Pallaki as Pedro *Shreya Anchan as Swarna == Release == The Times of India gave the film a rating of four out of five stars and noted that "Those looking at a getaway for three hours in a cinema hall for some laughs, a little tears and a story that is soulful and satisfying, this is definitely recommended". Deccan Herald, on the contrary, gave the film a rating of three out of five stars annd stated that "We are offered a Hollywood-ish upgrade of the romantic film, with some bows in the direction of the Hindi film Queen. The romantic bits are, quite frankly, sahasra-yawny despite their being carefully underplayed and adroitly avoiding Nicholas Shakespeare territory. == References == == External links == * Category: 2018 films Category: Indian romantic drama films Category:Indian films Category:2018 romantic drama films
title: Katheyondu Shuruvagide
